querystring.select: SELECT A.APP_COLLATERAL_ID AS AppCollateralId,A.APP_ID AS AppId,A.COLLATERAL_SEQ_NO AS CollSeqNo,A.FULL_ASSET_CODE AS FullAssetCode,A.FULL_ASSET_NAME AS FullAssetName, A.MR_COLLATERAL_CONDITION_CODE AS MrCollConditionCode, A.MR_COLLATERAL_USAGE_CODE AS MrCollUsageCode,A.COLLATERAL_STAT AS CollStat,A.SERIAL_NO_1 AS Serial1,A.SERIAL_NO_2 AS Serial2,A.SERIAL_NO_3 AS Serial3,A.COLLATERAL_VALUE_AMT AS CollValueAmt,A.ASSET_TYPE_CODE AS AssetTypeCode,A.ASSET_CATEGORY_CODE AS AssetCategoryCode,A.COLLATERAL_NOTES AS CollNotes,A.COLLATERAL_PRCNT AS CollPrcnt,A.MANUFACTURING_YEAR AS ManufacturingYear,A.IS_MAIN_COLLATERAL AS IsMainColl, B.OWNER_NAME AS OwnerName
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP_COLLATERAL A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.APP_COLLATERAL_REGISTRATION B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_COLLATERAL_ID = B.APP_COLLATERAL_ID
